**Hurried Retreat** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The kobold warrior is adjacent to at least one enemy. **Effect** The kobold warrior Strides up to its Speed plus 5 feet and gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by this movement.
